title: help please
body:
Im having an issue
I normally run league of legends so smoothly, 144 frams very high settings and i could stream and what not, nothing was ever wrong ... Now my computer drops all the way to 30 frames ive updated my drivers deleted league and reinstalled it but nothing is working can any one help?

Processor:Intel(R)Core(TM)i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70GHz 2.70GHz

GPU:NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB

replies.body: Eeeeee yikes, that's a major drop in framerate! There might be something that isn't interacting correctly between League and your drivers, so let's be safe and double check your drivers as well as the other steps in this handy [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).
